result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for initializing a Sentry client for error tracking and downloading a new IP location database using Redis.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on separation of concerns by handling error tracking and database management in a single entry point.

cmd/ip_location/main.go.purpose: This file initializes a Sentry client for error tracking and downloads a new IP location database using Redis.
side_effects: Logs errors if Sentry initialization fails
Downloads a new IP location database
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information in logs
Failure to initialize Sentry may lead to untracked errors
